content: all stitches 5 k to last 2 sts kfb k1 6 knit all stitches 7 k to last 2 sts kfb k1 8 knit all stitches 9 k to last 2 sts kfb k1 10 knit all stitches repeat eyelet and garter increase sections a total of 5 times then repeat the eyelet section once more 110 stitches garter section decrease on one edge 1 k to last 4 stitches k2tog k2 2 knit all stitches 3 k to last 4 stitches k2tog k2 4 knit all stitches 5 k to last 4 stitches k2tog k2 6 knit all stitches 7 k to last 4 stitches k2tog k2 8 knit all stitches 9 k to last 4 stitches k2tog k2 10 knit all stitches eyelet section decreases on one edge 1 k3 *k2tog yo repeat from * last 4 stitches k2tog k2 2 k3 purl to last 3 stitches k3 3 k3 *k2tog yo repeat from * to last 3 stitches k2tog k1 4 k3 purl to last 3 stitches k3 5 k3 *k2tog yo repeat from * last 4 stitches k2tog k2 6 k3 purl to last 3 stitches k3 7 k3 *k2tog yo repeat from * to last 3 stitches k2tog k1 8 k3 purl to last 3 stitches k3 9 k3 *k2tog yo repeat from * last 4 stitches k2tog k2 10 k3 purl to last 3 stitches k3 repeat garter and eyelet decrease sections twice then repeat the garter section once more 85 stitches bind off loosely sew the short edges together i suggest blocking before sewing together
